name: Nervous (Midnight Mania)
lyric:
every midnight, there's a little weeper in my heart
solitude is casting him from the dark
　　
i am so nervous
　　
my dear disease is my best friend
nothing takes us apart until the end
　　
i am so nervous
　　
every midnight, i feel like i'm in my own grave
lying with deadly silence and all the strange blames
　　
i am so nervous
lyric_extra:
